==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|なか|たか|k2=だか|かた|k3=がた|r=y|yomi=kun}}

===Etymology===
From {{compound|中|高|型|t1=middle|t2=high (pitch)|t3=form|lang=ja}}, literally "(in the middle the pitch is high)-form".

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|なかだかがた|acc=h|y=k}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|なかだかがた}}
# The accent pattern in Japanese in which a syllable that is neither the first nor the last within that word is accented.
